definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of

sentences.english: They've never been able to come to grips with the fact they're bankrupt.
sentences.chinese: 他們永遠也無法面對自己是破產者的事實。

sentences.english: Dubai sorely lacked such oversight in the run-up to the crash.
sentences.chinese: 在走向破產的道路上，迪拜非常缺乏這樣的監管。

sentences.english: The prospect of bankruptcy of his company beetled over the general manager.
sentences.chinese: 總經理面臨他的公司破產的陰暗前景。

sentences.english: But many companies go broke because of bad receivables.
sentences.chinese: 但是許多公司因爲壞的應收賬款而破產。

sentences.english: And now you're knee-deep in two of them.
sentences.chinese: 而現在，你卻深陷在兩樁破產案裏。
決定破產管理能力的是什麼？

sentences.english: I probably would have let Lehman go, too.
The bankruptcy of Lehman might have been avoided but what would have happened to the asset super-bubble?
sentences.chinese: 雷曼或許會免於破產，但資產超級泡沫會怎樣？

sentences.english: In this paper, we research the high order expansion of heavy tail dfs.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了一類重尾分佈下破產概率的高階展式。

sentences.english: When their factories go bust, residents have no money to buy food.
sentences.chinese: 當他們的工廠破產時，居民將沒有錢去購買食物。
中產階級的破產者將越來越多。

sentences.english: The company is on the verge of insolvency.
The ruin probabilities in the compound binomial risk model;
sentences.chinese: 考慮了複合負二項風險模型下的破產概率。

sentences.english: The second part is about the analysis of the right foundation of the Bankruptcy Recall Right.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是有關破產取回權行使的相關問題的分析。

sentences.english: We also have acquired internet assets that are in liquidation or bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 我們也收購了一些已倒閉或破產的網絡資產？

sentences.english: Speculators eager to earn a fast buck often wind up in bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 急於想發橫財的投機者到頭來往往破產。

definition: to owe a debt/the sum owed
to delay/to postpone/to keep putting sth off/to procrastinate/(computing) to lag
